<!-- Generated by agents-reverse-engineer -->

# src/types

Defines core TypeScript interfaces for file discovery results and exclusion metadata used throughout ARE's file walking and filtering pipeline.

## Contents

### [index.ts](./index.ts)
Exports `ExcludedFile` (path + reason), `DiscoveryResult` (files array + excluded array), and `DiscoveryStats` (totalFiles, includedFiles, excludedFiles, exclusionReasons map).

## API Surface

```typescript
interface ExcludedFile {
  path: string;
  reason: string;
}

interface DiscoveryResult {
  files: string[];
  excluded: ExcludedFile[];
}

interface DiscoveryStats {
  totalFiles: number;
  includedFiles: number;
  excludedFiles: number;
  exclusionReasons: Record<string, number>;
}
```

`DiscoveryResult` returned by `src/discovery/run.ts`. `DiscoveryStats` computed from aggregated results for telemetry. `ExcludedFile.reason` populated by filter chain in `src/discovery/filters/` (gitignore, binary, vendor filters).

## Behavioral Contracts

### ExcludedFile.reason values
Standardized reason strings emitted by discovery filters:
- `"matched .gitignore pattern"` (from `src/discovery/filters/gitignore.ts`)
- `"binary file detected"` (from `src/discovery/filters/binary.ts`)
- `"vendor/node_modules path"` (from `src/discovery/filters/vendor.ts`)

## File Relationships

Consumed by `src/cli/discover.ts` command handler for CLI output formatting. Used by `src/discovery/run.ts` walker to structure file traversal results. Filter chain in `src/discovery/filters/` constructs `ExcludedFile` instances with filter-specific `reason` strings.
